original: Dhvajāgrasūtra
analyzed: dhvaja agra sūtra

original: Sand_1 evaṁ mayā śrutam / ekasmiṁ samaye bhagavāṁ śrāvastyāṁ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
analyzed: san evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasya ārāme

original: Sand_2 tatra bhagavāṁ bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
analyzed: san tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma

original: Sand_3 sati vo bhikṣava araṇyagatānāṁ vā vṛkṣamūlagatānāṁ vā śunyāgāragatānāṁ vā utpadyeta bhayaṁ vā chambitatvaṁ vā romaharṣo vā /
analyzed: sant sati vaḥ bhikṣavaḥ araṇya gatānām vā vṛkṣa mūla gatānām vā śunyāgāra gatānām vā utpadyeta bhayam vā chambita tvam vā romaharṣaḥ vā

original: Sand_4 māṁ yūyaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ākārataḥ samanusmarata /
analyzed: san mām yūyam tasmin samaye ākārataḥ samanusmarata

original: Sand_5 iti hi sa bhagavāṁ tathāgato ’rhāṁ samyaksaṁbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanna sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathi śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṁ  #
analyzed: iti hi sa bhagavām tathāgataḥ rhām samyaksabuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa sampanna sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathi śāstā deva manuṣyāṇām

original: buddho bhagavāṁ /
analyzed: buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: Sand_6 māṁ vas tasmiṁ samaye ākārataḥ samanusmaratām / yad utpatsyate bhayaṁ vā chambitatvaṁ vā romaharṣo vā tat prahāsyate /
analyzed: sat mām vaḥ tasmin samaye ākārataḥ samanusmaratām yat utpatsyate bhayam vā chambita tvam vā roma harṣaḥ vā tat prahāsyate

original: Sand_7 bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣava śakro devendro devāsurasaṁgrāme pratyupasthite devāms trāyastriṁśān āmantrayati /
analyzed: san bhūta pūrvam bhikṣavaḥ śakraḥ deva indraḥ deva asura sagrāme pratyupasthite devān trāyastriśān āmantrayati

original: Sand_8 sati vo māriṣā devāsurasaṁgrāme samabhirūḍhāṇāṁ utpadyeta bhayaṁ vā chambitatvaṁ vā romaharṣo vā /
analyzed: sant sati vaḥ māriṣāḥ deva asura sagrāme samabhirūḍhāṇām utpadyeta bhayam vā chambita tvam vā roma harṣaḥ vā

original: Sand_9 mama vas tasmiṁ samaye vaijayanto dhvajāgraḥ samanusmartavyaḥ / mama vas tasmiṁ samaye
analyzed: san mama vaḥ tasmin samaye vaijayantaḥ dhvaja agraḥ samanusmartavyaḥ mama vaḥ tasmin samaye

original: vaijayantaṁ dhvajāgraṁ samanusmaratāṁ / yad utpatsyate bhayaṁ vā chambitatvaṁ vā
analyzed: vaijayantam dhvaja agram samanusmaratām yat utpatsyate bhayam vā chambita tvam vā

original: romaharṣo vā tat prahāsyate /
analyzed: romaharṣaḥ vā tat prahāsyate

original: Sand_10 evam eva sati vo bhikṣava araṇyagatānāṁ vā vṛkṣamūlagatānāṁ vā śunyāgāragatānāṁ vā utpadyeta bhayaṁ vā chambitatvaṁ vā romaharṣo vā
analyzed: evam eva sati vaḥ bhikṣavaḥ araṇya gatānām vā vṛkṣa mūla gatānām vā śunyāgāra gatānām vā utpadyeta bhayam vā chambita tvam vā romaharṣaḥ vā

original: Sand_11 māṁ yūyaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ākārataḥ samanusmarata / iti hi sa bhagavāṁ yāvad buddho bhagavāṁ /
analyzed: mām yūyam tasmin samaye ākārataḥ samanusmarata iti hi sa bhagavān yāvat buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: Sand_12 māṁ vas tasmiṁ samaye ākārataḥ samanusmaratāṁ yad utpatsyate bhayaṁ vā chambitatvaṁ vā romaharṣo vā tat prahāsyate /
analyzed: mām vaḥ tasmin samaye ākārataḥ samanusmaratām yat utpatsyate bhayam vā chambita tvam vā roma harṣaḥ vā tat prahāsyate

original: Sand_13 tat kasmād dheto / sa hi śakro devendraḥ sarāgaḥ sadveṣaḥ samoha aparimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ  #
analyzed: tat kasmāt hetoḥ sa hi śakraḥ deva indraḥ sa rāgaḥ sa dveṣaḥ sa mohaḥ a parimuktaḥ jāti jarā vyādhi maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsebhyaḥ

original: aparimukto duḥkhād iti vadāmi /
analyzed: a parimuktaḥ duḥkhāt iti vadāmi

original: Sand_14 bhīru chambī utrāsī palāyī sa ekatā bibhety api utrāsity api palāyaty api /
analyzed: bhīru chambī utrāsī palāyī saḥ ekatā bibheti api utrāsiti api palāyati api

original: Sand_15 ahaṁ khalu tathāgato loke utpanna arhāṁ samyaksaṁbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṁpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathi śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṁ  #
analyzed: aham khalu tathāgataḥ loke utpanna arhām samyaksabuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa sapannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathi śāstā deva manuṣyāṇām

original: buddho bhagavāṁ /
analyzed: buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: Sand_16 vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamohaḥ parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhya parimukto duḥkhād iti vadāmi
analyzed: vigata rāgaḥ vigata dveṣaḥ vigata mohaḥ parimuktaḥ jāti jarā vyādhi maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsebhyaḥ parimuktaḥ duḥkhāt iti vadāmi

original: Sand_17 abhīrur acchaṁbī anutrāsī apalāyī /
analyzed: abhīruḥ acchabī anutrāsī apalāyī

original: Sand_18 tasya mama bhikṣava abhīruṇa acchaṁbina anutrāsina apalāyinaḥ śrotavyaṁ vacanaṁ kartavyaṁ anuśāsanaṁ karaṇīyam idaṁ sthānam iti /
analyzed: tasya mama bhikṣavaḥ abhīruṇaḥ acchabinaḥ anutrāsinaḥ apalāyinaḥ śrotavyam vacanam kartavyam anuśāsanam karaṇīyam idam sthānam iti

original: Sand_19 idam avocad bhagavāṁ āpatamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandam /
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān āpata manasaḥ te bhikṣavaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandam

original: Sand_20 dhvajāgrasūtraṁ / samāptaḥ //
analyzed: dhvaja agra sūtram samāptaḥ
